revised_title: Friedrich Adolf Paneth: A Pioneering Chemist and Scholar
tldr: This article is a biographical memoir of Friedrich Adolf Paneth, a renowned chemist and scholar who made significant contributions to the fields of radioactivity, free radical chemistry, helium analysis, and meteorites. Paneth's life and work are discussed in detail, from his early education and career in Vienna to his later positions in Germany, England, and Canada. His passion for historical chemistry and his ability to bring together diverse scientific disciplines are highlighted, as well as his leadership and impact on the scientific community.
